.. _contact:

Contact
==================

If you want to contact us, we recommend you to do it via `gitter <https://gitter.im/Sec-Lope-de-Vega>`_, 
or in the `google groups <https://groups.google.com/g/seclopedevega-users>`_.  
For more private talks, just send us an `email <seclopedevega@gmail.com>`_.
